result.execSummary:
The defendant Ismael Antonio Medina was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Racine County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Pay all court costs. Defendant must submit a DNA sample as required by law if not previously provided.  Defendant must pay mandatory DNA surcharge.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ismael Antonio Medina

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Ismael Antonio Medina
Current: 4107 Lasalle St, Racine, WI 53402 United States  (Effective: 10-25-2022)
Prior: 638 saint patrick st, Racine, WI 53402 United States

10:30 AM Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Flynn in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Ismael Antonio Medina in court, in custody.  Attorney William A Demet in court for Ismael Antonio Medina. Court Reporter Donna Moore. 

Parties are prepared to proceed with plea/sentencing today. 

State puts offer on the record. Defense confirms offer. 

Plea questionnaire filed. Court holds plea colloquy with defendant. 

Plea - GUILTY
State consents to jury waiver. 
Agreement to use complaint for factual basis. 
BTC: GUILTY.
Parties give arguments as to sentencing.

BTC: 36 DAYS RCJ; concurrent to any other sentence. 36 days credit for time served  
Deft is Ordered to provide a DNA specimen;
Court Costs+ DNA surcharge; reduced to judgement.

ADDRESS INFO for Ismael Antonio Medina
Current: 638 saint patrick st, Racine, WI 53402 United States  (Effective: 07-11-2022)
Prior: 702 High St, Racine, WI 53404

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: Make all court appearances on time. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit. It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any alcohol.  This is to be monitored through random drug screens and/or breathalyzers by the Racine County Alternatives Program, Room MC340 (Law Enforcement Center 717 Wisconsin Ave Racine WI 53403). New referrals from Court must report on the day of their Court appearance.  Jail releases must report the following business day (M-Fr 8am-4:30pm).  In addition to random testing, the defendant is further ordered to test after each court appearance.

2:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Jacob Nelson Garman in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ismael Antonio Medina in court, in custody.  Attorney William A Demet in court for Ismael Antonio Medina. Court Reporter:  Nancy Szeklinski. 
Defense is seeking for the cash bond to be modified to a signature bond and provides arguments to support bond modification request. 
State does not object. 
BTC: $1000 cash bond is converted to a $1000 signature bond. Matter set over.
Bail/bond hearing on July 5, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 28, 2022 at 09:30 am.
